description:
Have you ever opened up Facebook, sent a post, and then opened another app and sent the exact same post? Take This Course to Never Do That Again!

IFTTT & Facebook Social Automation using Facebook Triggers is a course on how to use every type of Post Facebook to Automatically share that information to Other Places like Pinterest, Tumblr, Google Calendar, and more!

The course is structured as a step by step tutorial, but each lesson can be viewed independent of the others. By the end, you'll know the differences between the types of posts, what information each type has to pass on to the next Network/Service, and how to accept info from Hardware / Services to create new Facebook Posts!
title: IFTTT & Facebook - Social Automation using Facebook Triggers
